control.description: KoolComboBox extends the capability of combobox to the max.Easy-to-use, highly customized interface, advanced behavior options are the strongest points that make KoolComboBox better than any other industrial similar controls.

KoolComboBox as an advanced solution to replace old and limited default <select> tag. KoolComboBox extends the capability of combo box to the max. Easy-to-use, highly customized interface, advanced behavior options are the strongest points that make KoolComboBox better than any other industrial similar controls.
Key Features :
  • Semantic HTML design
  • Simple PHP control interface
  • Featured-rich client-side control
  • Highly cusomized interface with template
  • Many advanced behaviors
  • CSS styles can be fully customized
